text: Bethesda Game Studios is a studio that makes video games. This studio belongs to Bethesda Softworks, which opened it in 1986. The studio headquarters is located in Rockville, Maryland, United States. Todd Howard has served as game director on most of their games since Fallout 3. ==Games== Year Title Genres Platforms 1986 Gridiron!
